desc:1763696141: When your Victory Rush heals you, you grow slightly larger.
desc:3761749142:
When your health is brought below {1}%, you gain a Second Wind, healing you for {2}% of your max health over {3} sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every {4} sec.
desc:3161642187: Shield Slam critical strikes grant an additional stack of Colossal Might.
desc:2397469338: Activating Recklessness grants a charge of Thunder Blast.
desc:191422530: Your Charge leaves a trail of fire in its wake. If you're going to Charge why not do it with some style?
desc:1402297829: When Raging Blow resets its own cooldown, your next Raging Blow deals {1}% additional damage and {2}% additional critical damage.
desc:3743217799:
When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by {1} sec and apply {2} stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.
desc:3741463313: Colossal Might increases the damage of your Revenge by {1}% per stack.
desc:116658766: Bloodthirst has a {1}% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for {2} damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.
desc:1551197504: Damage prevented by each use of Ignore Pain is increased by {1}%.
desc:1953258002:
Damaging enemies with Thunder Clap, Revenge, or Execute has a {1}% chance to also strike one with a lightning bolt, dealing {2} Nature damage and generating {3} Rage.

Lightning Strikes occur {4}% more often during Avatar.
name:1225328972: Keep Your Feet on the Ground
desc:2568858562:
Physical damage taken reduced by {1}%.

Thunder Blast reduces damage you take by {2}% for {3} sec.
desc:2957730281:
Every {1} Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking {2} additional time (max {3}). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
desc:2554437415: Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.
desc:4202349989:
Shield Slam damage increased by {1}%.

Bloodthirst and Rampage damage increased by {2}%.
desc:3646785461:
Stormstrike or Nature damage your abilities deal is increased by {1}%. Stormstrike damage ignores Armor.

Thunder Clap damage increased by {2}%, and it generates {3} Rage. 

Seismic Reverberations, Improved Whirlwind, Meat Cleaver, and Barbaric Training now affect Thunder Clap in addition to Whirlwind.
desc:2377432269:
Casting Avatar grants you {1} charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a {2}% chance to grant you Avatar for {3} secs.

|T460957:24|t{FFFFFFFF|Thunder Blast}
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.
desc:741375376: Heroic Leap reduces the cooldown of Charge by {1} sec and Charge reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by {2} sec.
desc:2857021454: Your Thunder Clap visual includes a lightning strike.
desc:1411428472:
Shield Slam and Revenge damage increased by {1}%.

Shield Slam generates an additional {2} Rage.
desc:1712081535: When you Heroic Leap you now land with thunder.
desc:2758011105:
Lightning Strikes generate {1} Rage.

Raging Blow and Execute damage increased by {2}%.
desc:1070974349: Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by {1}% and the amount of damage blocked by your critical blocks is increased by {2}%.
desc:80811141: Lightning Strikes have a {1}% chance to make your next {2} Shield Slams have no cooldown.
desc:1620889487: Your attacks trigger Lightning Strikes {1}% more often.
desc:3023122732: Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by {1}% for {2} sec, max {3} stacks.
desc:2160235778:
You deal {1}% more damage and take {2}% less damage.

Size increased by {3}%.
desc:1932527897: Your Heroic Throw now launches your main hand weapon.
desc:218082700: Your attacks against your primary target have a high chance to overwhelm their defenses and trigger a Slayer's Strike, dealing {1} damage and applying Marked for Execution, increasing the damage they take from your next Execute by {2}%. Stacks {3} times.
desc:2211537922: Shockwave's stun duration is increased by {1} sec and reduces the movement speed of affected enemies by {2}% for {3} sec after the stun ends.
desc:3152205504:
Stamina increased by {1}%.

Victory Rush increases your maximum health by {2}% for {3} sec. When this health increase expires, you heal for any amount of the original Victory Rush that healed you in excess of your full health.
desc:2815351687: Enrage increases the damage your abilities deal by an additional {1}% and Enrage's duration is increased by {2} sec.
desc:1820499721: Your Recklessness ability causes the appearance of your weapon to change to that of a random weapon from your bag for {1} min.
desc:638779541:
Intervene now has {1} charges and reduces the ally's damage taken by {2}% for {3} sec.

Intervene's cooldown is increased by {4} sec.
desc:3347538765: Storm Bolt also hits {1} additional nearby [plural|Target|targets], stunning them for {2} sec, but its cooldown is increased by {3} sec.
desc:1943092216: Bloodthirst critical strikes increase the damage of your next Bloodthirst by {1}%.
desc:1505216917: Gives a chance to parry enemy melee attacks.
desc:69996179: Shockwave, Revenge, and Whirlwind deal {1}% more damage per target affected up to {2}.
desc:110596240: Lightning Strikes also deal {1} to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond {2} targets.
name:156170348: Glyph of the Spear of Bastion
desc:4065509568: Your Champion's Spear visual is altered to resemble the Spear of Bastion Covenant Ability.
desc:1232441517: Your Intervene leaves a trail of fire in its wake. If you're going to Intervene why not do it with some style?
desc:9390054: Reduces the cost of Sunder Armor by {1}%.
desc:4284469531:
Colossal Might now stacks up to {1} times. If you would gain a stack of Colossal Might and are at max stacks, the cooldown of Demolish is reduced by {2} sec.

Enemies affected by Demolish take up to {3}% more damage from you and deal up to {4}% less damage to you for {5} sec based on the number of stacks of Colossal Might consumed by Demolish.
desc:67565102: Each strike of Bladestorm deals an additional {1}% damage evenly split across all targets.
desc:2343943247: You heal for {1}% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
desc:2760916890:
Colossal Might increases damage dealt by your next Demolish by {1}%, stacking up to {2} times.

Shield Slam grants a stack of Colossal Might and Revenge grants a stack of Colossal Might when it strikes {3} or more targets.
desc:3224273050: Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by {1}%.
desc:3327913079: Shockwave also knocks enemies into the air and its cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
desc:1056342507:
Unleash a series of precise and powerful strikes against your target, dealing {1} damage to it, and {2} damage to enemies within {3} yds of it. Deals reduced damage beyond {4} targets.

While channeling Demolish, you take {5}% less damage and are immune to stuns, knockbacks, and forced movement effects.

You can block, parry, dodge, and use certain defensive abilities while channeling Demolish.
desc:3986290007: Colossal Might increases the damage of your Rend and Deep Wounds by {1}% per stack.
desc:2500541232: The duration of Champion's Spear is increased by {1} sec. You deal {2}% increased critical strike damage to targets chained to your Spear.
desc:3269762996: Your Deep Wounds are even bloodier than normal.
desc:2056063675:
Your Shout abilities have additional effects.

|T136009:24|t {ffffffff|Berserker Shout}:

Targets receive {6}% more damage from all sources while bleeding.
desc:2298741886: Your next Rampage after Bladestorm ends deals {1}% additional damage.
desc:1674838500: You get so angry when Enraged that you catch on fire.
desc:2766767957: Your Execute critical strikes summon a flock of carrion birds.
desc:1741196708: Execute increases the critical strike chance of Execute by {1}% for {2} sec, stacking up to {3} times.
desc:3921566809: Restores {1}% health instantly and removes all diseases, poisons, and curses affecting you.
desc:2816970693: Smashes the enemy's armor, dealing {1} Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by {2}% for {3} sec.
desc:469542155:
Cooldown of Pummel reduced by {1} sec. 

Successfully interrupting an enemy increases the damage you deal to them by {2}% for {3} sec.
desc:730423807: Odyn's Fury increases your auto-attack damage and speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
desc:2272834569: Demoralizes all enemies within {1} yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by {2}% for {3} sec.
desc:77810663:
You have a chance to become Enraged while you are suffering movement impairing effects.

Suffering loss of control effects have a chance to grant you Recklessness for {1} sec.
desc:2235453827:
Causes the targeted enemy to cower in fear and up to {1} additional enemies within {2} yards to flee.
Targets are disoriented for {3} sec.
